greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of incongruent ways to tile a 5 X 2n room with 1x2 Tatami mats. At most 3 Tatami mats may meet at a point.
link: R. J. Mathar, Paving rectangular regions with rectangular tiles,...., arXiv:1311.6135 [math.CO], Table 12.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, -1, -1, -1).
formula: a(n) = sum(A102541(n-k-2, n-2*k-4), k=0..floor((n-4)/2)), n >= 4. - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 24 2013
xref: Cf. A068924 for total number of tilings, A068926 for more info.
results.author: _Dean Hickerson_, Mar 11 2002
ext: G.f. proposed by Maksym Voznyy checked and corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 16 2009.
